name: Michael Bleigh
biography: Michael Bleigh is the Creative Director and Open Source Activist for Intridea as well as the project manager for Present.ly, the business micro-sharing platform. Michael’s experience goes through every part of the web application lifecycle from conception and planning to design and back-end development. He has built a number of open-source projects used widely throughout the Ruby community and has also presented at several conferences including RailsConf Europe 2008.
